Sentencas: The SOFC-Engine hybrid system is considered suitable as a marine power system due to its impressive attributes, including high efficiency and effective adaptability to variable loads.
Titulo: Exergetic and exergoeconomic evaluation of an SOFC-Engine-ORC hybrid power generation system with methanol for ship application

Sentencas: Combined with the ORC system and methanol fuel, the system's efficiency and carbon reduction can be taken to the next level.
Titulo: Exergetic and exergoeconomic evaluation of an SOFC-Engine-ORC hybrid power generation system with methanol for ship application

Sentencas: This study introduces a novel solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)-Engine-Organic Rankine cycle (ORC) hybrid power generation system that operates on methanol.
Titulo: Exergetic and exergoeconomic evaluation of an SOFC-Engine-ORC hybrid power generation system with methanol for ship application

Sentencas: Rigorous assessments were conducted utilizing energy analysis, exergetic analysis, and exergoeconomic analysis.

Sentencas: These evaluations aimed to pinpoint precise strategies for enhancing system efficiency while curbing expenses.
Titulo: Exergetic and exergoeconomic evaluation of an SOFC-Engine-ORC hybrid power generation system with methanol for ship application

Sentencas: The results show that the power generation efficiency of the hybrid system is 61.86%, and the exergy efficiency was 58.06%.
Titulo: Exergetic and exergoeconomic evaluation of an SOFC-Engine-ORC hybrid power generation system with methanol for ship application

Sentencas: Notably, the air preheater and engine emerge as components causing substantial exergy losses.
Titulo: Exergetic and exergoeconomic evaluation of an SOFC-Engine-ORC hybrid power generation system with methanol for ship application

Sentencas: Through exergoeconomic analysis, the exergy cost distribution across all system parts was unveiled.
Titulo: Exergetic and exergoeconomic evaluation of an SOFC-Engine-ORC hybrid power generation system with methanol for ship application

Sentencas: The reformer's exergoeconomic factor registers the highest at 77.62%.
Titulo: Exergetic and exergoeconomic evaluation of an SOFC-Engine-ORC hybrid power generation system with methanol for ship application

Sentencas: Consequently, mitigating the exergy cost associated with the reformer holds paramount importance in augmenting overall system revenue.
Titulo: Exergetic and exergoeconomic evaluation of an SOFC-Engine-ORC hybrid power generation system with methanol for ship application

Sentencas: Remarkably, the engine incurs the highest cost of exergy destruction at 10.134 $/h.
